org.opengis.referencing.crs.CoordinateReferenceSystem

Packages that use CoordinateReferenceSystem
Package
Description
org.opengis.coordinate
Tuple of coordinate values.
org.opengis.example
Access to examples of GeoAPI implementations.
org.opengis.geometry
Root package for geometries.
org.opengis.referencing.crs
Reference systems by coordinates.
org.opengis.referencing.operation
Coordinate operations (relationship between any two CRS).
org.opengis.test
The GeoAPI conformance testing framework.
org.opengis.test.dataset
Provides small test data files together with verification methods for applications reading those data.
org.opengis.test.referencing
Validators and test suites for the org.opengis.referencing package.

  • Uses of CoordinateReferenceSystem in org.opengis.referencing.crs

    Subinterfaces of CoordinateReferenceSystem in org.opengis.referencing.crs
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    CompoundCRS
    A CRS describing the position of points through two or more independent CRSs.
    interface 
    DerivedCRS
    A CRS that is defined by applying a coordinate conversion to another preexisting CRS.
    interface 
    EngineeringCRS
    A 1-, 2- or 3-dimensional CRS used locally.
    interface 
    GeneralDerivedCRS
    Deprecated.
    As of ISO 19111:2019, this interface is renamed as DerivedCRS.
    interface 
    GeocentricCRS
    Deprecated.
    This type was defined in 2003 but removed in 2007.
    interface 
    GeodeticCRS
    A 2- or 3-dimensional CRS used over the whole planet or substantial parts of it.
    interface 
    GeographicCRS
    A 2- or 3-dimensional CRS based on an ellipsoidal approximation of the geoid.
    interface 
    ImageCRS
    Deprecated.
    Replaced by EngineeringCRS as of ISO 19111:2019.
    interface 
    ParametricCRS
    A 1-dimensional CRS which uses parameter values or functions.
    interface 
    ProjectedCRS
    A 2- or 3-dimensional CRS based on an approximation of the shape of the planet's surface by a plane.
    interface 
    SingleCRS
    Base type of CRS related to an object by a datum or datum ensemble.
    interface 
    TemporalCRS
    A 1-dimensional CRS used for the recording of time.
    interface 
    VerticalCRS
    A 1-dimensional CRS used for recording heights or depths.
